control_attributes.control_description: The organization: a. Sanitizes [Assignment: organization-defined information system media] prior to disposal, release out of organizational control, or release for reuse using [Assignment: organization-defined sanitization techniques and procedures] in accordance with applicable federal and organizational standards and policies; andb. Employs sanitization mechanisms with the strength and integrity commensurate with the security category or classification of the information.
control_attributes.Control_description: The organization prohibits the use of portable storage devices in organizational information systems when such devices have no identifiable owner.

Control Statement: The organization: a. Sanitizes [Assignment: organization-defined information system media] prior to disposal, release out of organizational control, or release for reuse using [Assignment: organization-defined sanitization techniques and procedures] in accordance with applicable federal and organizational standards and policies; andb. Employs sanitization mechanisms with the strength and integrity commensurate with the security category or classification of the information.
